resources.string: Thank you for contacting us. Together we deliver governance !

string-array.name: lawandorder
string-array.item: No close by police station in my area.
Rowdiness in on the rise in the neighbourhood.
Judgements are dragging for long, improve the judiciary.
Police station not well maintained, gives gloomy feeling.
Courts are becoming totally unaffordable do something.
Increase constable/Inspector salary, bribes on rise.
police is not working to hard to reach to people.
High level of distrust on police.
should not be there a police awareness day, once in 3 months, where citizen should be encouraged to review there police stations, if they are happy with service of staff.
court system sucks, i want to bow out of contract of signing the constitution.
should not there be a court awareness day, once in 3 months, where citizens should be encouraged to review there courts, to check that they are happy with service of the staff.

string-array.name: water
string-array.item: No municipality water in this area.
We have to heavily rely on tankers for water supply, please look into it.
Water pipes leaking all over the place, water contamination dangers.
Water department staff totally outdated… Stoneage.
Don\'t know how water comes to the city, please launch a water awareness day.

string-array.name: electricity
string-array.item: Enough these power cuts, increase power generation capacity.
Power stations and transformers not well maintained,making my area look dirty.
Transformers unprotected. Blast every now and then.
Powerlines are hanging too low in my neighbourhood.
Electricity department staff totally outdated… Stoneage.
Power too costly , totally not affordable, reduce prices.
No initative from power department on educating customer.
Why we do not have electricity awareness day, I want to know what I pay for.

string-array.name: transportation
string-array.item: No public buses on this route.
No public buses in my area.
Traffic Congestion too much we need metro tracks.
This point has become congestion hotspot do something.
Please have a training programme before giving auto licenses.
As citizen want to how bus system work please launch a awareness campaign.

string-array.name: road
string-array.item: What will we do without roads, no roads here city sucks.
There are potholes everywhere on this road.
These Roads are dirty all the time do somethings.
How these road tender get allocate, as citizen we need to know, please launch a awareness programme.
No cleanliness, launch an awareness programme on how citizens can help.

string-array.name: sewage
string-array.item: No Sewage pipe in my area.
No close by municipality Garbage truck in my area.
Please increase the garbage truck capacity.
Lot of garbage is left unaddressed.
My surrounding has become a garbage yard, please take care of it.
Garbage has made environment like hell, is this the city we dreamt of.
Sewage / Sanitation department staff is very rude.
Sewage/Sanitation department staff is totally outdated… Stoneage.
Streets are dirty all the time, please launch awareness programme. Explain how citizens can help.

resources.string: Submitting Issue and retrieving responsible MLA information.

About Us – Swaraj – In olden days, kings toured their kingdoms to check the well-being of civilians and make sure that there is no disconnect between the information received from his darbar members and the civilian. Analogous to the historic kingdoms is a vast empire today, a country of 120 crore divided into states and in turn constituencies, a total of 4200 with each housing between 1.5–2 lakh grown up and responsible citizens working day and night to build their future for the country. What they want in turn is to get their day-to-day problems heard and resolved efficiently by the governing bodies of the nation.


In a modern day set up, a disconnect between the citizens and their representatives, information gap and the inability to handle massive feedbacks has led to a poor unresponsive governance. Swaraj is an initiative to bridge this gap and empower citizens to strengthen local leadership. It helps you to raise your problems within seconds and we will make sure they are heard and acted upon.


All that needs to be done is to choose the issue category, select the issue from a predefined list and tap a button to post the issue from your current location received via GPS. Now, isn’t that simple! So, if you have problem in your locality, what are you waiting for?
Analytics currently available only for Delhi and Bangalore. Coming to your area soon!
MLA information could not be fetched as the service is currently not available in this location. Will be coming here soon!.
